Compute cross-talk score from a Seurat Object

Source: R/crosstalk_funs.R
cytotalk_score.Rd

Compute cross-talk score from a Seurat Object

cytotalk_score(lr_res, sce, score_col, assay.type, seed, ...)

Arguments

lr_res

liana_pipe results

sce

SingleCellExperiment object

score_col

name of the score column

assay.type

data slot to be used

seed

random seed

...

placeholder

Details

This function executes all the required functions to extract and compute the cross-talk scores as defined by the Cytotalk authors.

Contents

Developed by Daniel Dimitrov, Charlotte Boys, Martin Garrido Rodríguez, Denes Turei, James Nagai.
